item.title: BlackInGenetics
item.description:
BIG is an organization dedicated to amplifying voices and work by Black-identifying geneticists. #BlackInGenetics

Contact us: http://blackingenetics.com/contact

Check out our job board: https://www.blackingenetics.com/job-board

item.title: Building Relationships to Diversify Graduate Education (BRDGE)
item.description:
**Building Relationships to Diversify Graduate Education ** Founded in 2019 by UNC-CH doctoral student Taylor Y. Dismuke, BRDGE Alliance was designed to be a STEM mentoring program with a goal to bridge the gap​ between underrepresented minorities and the STEM community.

The current focus of BRDGE Alliance is to develop undergraduate students at Historically Black colleges and universities by creating dynamic relationships with black graduate students at research institutions.

With the aim to improve diversity in STEM we will use application of peer mentorship, community, and personal and professional development activities to develop underrepresented students in STEM.
